title: How To Money Launder & Defend El Chapo w/ El Chapo's Lawyer
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary:
What up people, I've been watching Ozark and I had to learn how money laundering works, so I sat down with one of El Chapo's lawyers Jason Goldman to break it all down. He also told me how he defends the alleged worse people in the world, and the one group of people he couldn't defend. His name is Jason Goldman and he's an attorney with the law offices of Jeffery Lichtman. INDULGE!

https://www.linkedin.com/in/jason-goldman-155b58b0
https://twitter.com/jasongoldman_
